CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.7.1g, patientmedicalcomment (100AN) E2B (R2): B.1.10.7.1g, parentmedicalcomment (100AN)
E2B (R3): D.7.1.r.5 Comments E2B (R3): D.10.7.1.r.5 Comments Conformance: Optional Data Type: 2000AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This data element provides additional relevant information about the ‘medical condition’ that could not be captured otherwise in a structured data element.
CustomField.label: Comments
